price: 192. Rabbigayow! Qofkii aad geliso Naar, xaqiiq waa dulleysay, daalimiintuna ma leh (Aakhirada) gargaarayaal (iyo shafeecayaal midna).
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ مَن تُدۡخِلِ ٱلنَّارَ فَقَدۡ أَخۡزَيۡتَهُۥۖ وَمَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ أَنصَارٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka man tud'khili al-nāra faqad akhzaytahu wamā lilẓẓālimīna min anṣārin
